ModMetaData.name: World Map Beautification Project - for Medieval Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: crsongbird, Soul, CosmicOdeum
ModMetaData.description:
World Map Beautification Project - for Medieval Overhaul ==================================
Patches the World Map Beautification Project by CosmicOdeum to work with Medieval Overhaul by DankPyon. - Supporting Ancient Forest biome (patch by crsongbird) - Supporting Dark Forest biome (patch by Soul)
